definition: to discard in the wrong place (cigarette butts etc)/to leave one's things lying around
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
to take one's anger out on sb (who does not deserve it)
gongs and drums overture to a Chinese opera/to create a disturbance
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
to gesticulate while talking (idiom)/to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily
extreme joy turns to sorrow (idiom); Don't celebrate too soon, things could still go wrong!
to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
lit. to punch and kick (idiom); to beat up/fig. determined to sort out a problem
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
